extracted_playbook.title: Identify Installed Google Chrome Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check the installed version of Google Chrome on the system to determine if it is affected by CVE-2023-3079.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the installed Google Chrome version affected?

extracted_playbook.title: Update Google Chrome
extracted_playbook.description: Update Google Chrome to the latest version to mitigate the risks associated with CVE-2023-3079.

affected_products: Google Chrome prior to version 114.0.5735.110 for Windows
